title: Future Pinball (Please read description first)
description: The simulation "game" Future Pinball. Using this "game" you can create a truly yours pinball game. It's a small torrent and it takes about 5-10 minutes to download with U-Torrent. When you download it, go to the destination folder and double click at the Setup (FuturePinballSetup_v1.9.20081225) and it'll open. Just do whatever the Install says and the game will be installed. NOTE: When you open the installed file, ypu must click: File-New, what for it to load and then all the options should be active. The tools you enter won't be shown huge when you edit the board, but when you click "Play Board"(I don't know how to play, I know how to see it) the will be shown as the must be.
